title: Create a BigQuery read session
description: Creates a read session for a BigQuery table. The session contains one or more streams that you can use to read data from the table in parallel.

objective.narrative: The BigQuery Storage Read API offers a high-performance way to get row data out of BigQuery. The process involves two main steps: creating a session and then reading from the streams within that session. This sample covers the first step, `create_read_session`, which is fundamental to using the API. It sets up the context for subsequent parallel reads.

regionTags.name: bigquerystorage_v1beta2_bigqueryread_readsession_create
regionTags.title: Create a BigQuery read session
